exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce bsm_instr_compile to an evaluable reference.
Cannot coerce bsm_state_enc to an evaluable reference.
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros bsm_instr_compile bsm_state_enc H. unfold instruction_compiler_sound. unfold bsm_instr_compile. unfold bsm_state_enc. intros v w [H1 [H2 H3]]. split. - apply H1. - split. + apply H2. + intros p. specialize (H3 p). apply H3.
